bodydiv.p: Each consultative group has terms of reference, setting out the objectives of the group, the Boardâ€™s expectations of the members and the responsibilities of the Board to that group. The Board could have more than one consultative group on a project, for example, to provide advice on a particular aspect of a proposed IFRS Standard or post-implementation review.
